name: Dash Dash Bash
description:
DASH DASH BASH!

Play as a Knight that swore to never use a sword so instead he BASH his enemies using his shield!

Story

A married knight was living peacefully with his wife. When she got pregnant the knight swore to never raise a sword to anyone ever again to dedicate his life to his family. But all of a sudden his precious daughter was taken away without his knowledge. Assuming the rumored bandits as his daughter kidnapper he set out on an adventure to save his daugther.

Controls

[W][A][S][D] to MOVE

[LMB] to DASH and BASH

Credits
